Usage:
~ someone/something
~ someone to something
~ someone as someone

SinhalaMeanings: මතු වී සිටින සේ කැටයම් කරනවා
Usage:
~ B on A
~ A with B

~ as something

Usage:
~ something

~ B on A
~ A with B
